Text: The European 10,000m Cup is an annual 10,000 metres race for European athletes which was first held in 1997.

Text: European 10,000m Cup: The competition has roots in the Iberian 10,000 metres Championships – a competition between Spanish and Portuguese athletes that was held between 1991 and 1996 – and the first five editions of the European 10000 Metres Challenge were held in the Iberian Peninsula.
